marketplaces.name: claude-plugin-marketplaces
marketplaces.description: Custom plugins and marketplace for Claude Code skills

files.README.md:
# Claude Plugin Marketplaces

Custom plugins and marketplace for Claude Code skills.

## Plugins

### Product Manager
Product Manager skill for creating well-structured GitHub issues from feature requests and bug reports.

### Agent Knowledge
Agent Knowledge Base - Captures and organizes learnings from external AI agents into a structured knowledge base.

## Installation

In Claude Code, run:
```
/plugin add https://github.com/satriachandrayw/claude-plugin-marketplaces
```

## Usage

After installation, the skills will be available in your Claude Code session.

plugins.name: product-manager
plugins.description: Product Manager skill for creating well-structured GitHub issues from feature requests and bug reports

plugins.name: agent-knowledge
plugins.description: Agent Knowledge Base - Captures and organizes learnings from external AI agents into a structured knowledge base

plugins.name: bug-hunter
plugins.description: Random bug hunter that selects files weighted by recency, analyzes with context for bugs, and creates GitHub issues

plugins.name: bug-fixer
plugins.description: TDD-based bug fixer that reads GitHub issues, implements fixes, and creates PRs with severity-based batching
